name: Beatrice Aspiras
coverLetter:
Dear To Whoever It May Concern,
As a skilled Tender I read your new posting for a new Tender in interest. My experience aligns well with the qualifications you’re seeking in a particular role as a Tender at your cultivation and I am certain I would make a valuable addition to your organization.
With more than 2 years’ experience as a Tender, moreover while my on-the-top- job experience has afforded me a well-rounded skill set including leadership and communication skills. I have a knack for problem solving and work well independently and with little oversight. I am friendly, enthusiastic, and organized, I excel at:
- upselling
- hard worker
- self sustaining
In addition to my experience and personal qualities. I have a solid educational foundation and a passion as a self-starter and working well with as part of a strong team. I am familiar with your work and learn new procedures quickly.  As part of the team at your department, I hope to exceed your customer service and revenue expectations.
I am eagerly waiting to hear from you. I can be contacted to the information above. Thank you for your patience and for considering my letter.
Sincerely,
BEATRICE ASPIRAS
